Name: Domum
About the game: Home is where the heart is. Where it’s warm, where it’s safe. That’s how it’s supposed to be. Domum is an unsettling top-down adventure game where you will uncover the twisted secrets of a traumatic childhood on a sprawling, decayed estate. Solve puzzles, unlock multiple endings, and experience a rich narrative through the naïve eyes of a child and a man determined to solve the mysteries of his past. Experience a brief, but impactful tale with imagery you won’t forget, complete with compelling voice acting and video segments that will draw you in and never let go. It’s time to determine the fate of those that tormented you. It’s time to come home.
